########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    beam_mapper.py
    beam_sweep.py
    rss_calc.py
    kpi_agg.py
    beam_selector.py
    manual_beam.py
    rate_measure.py DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/stamina
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-stamina)
set(GR_TEST_PYTHON_DIRS ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/swig)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_beam_to_gpio ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_beam_to_gpio.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_beam_sweep ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_beam_sweep.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_trigger_max_val ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_trigger_max_val.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_beam_selector ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_beam_selector.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_rate_measure ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_rate_measure.py)
